comments: date: Stores the date of each post.
profileImage: Contains the path to the author's profile image.
postImage: Contains the path to the main image used in the post, or null if there’s no image.
title: Optional title for the post, or null if the post has no title.
content: The main content or description of the post.
likes: Initialized to 0 but can be updated later as the post receives likes.

posts.author: Riika Seeba
posts.content: Went to my favorite restaurant. They served (as always) the best food in town.

posts.author: Riika Seeba
posts.title: Exciting Cultural Event in Autumnal Tallinn
posts.content: This autumn, Tallinn hosts several fascinating cultural events that attract both locals and tourists. A standout is the Tallinn Light Festival, where the streets of the Old Town are filled with mesmerizing light installations.

posts.author: Riika Seeba
posts.title: Updates at the University of Tartu Library
posts.content: The University of Tartu Library has undergone significant renovations, offering even more modern spaces for students and visitors. The spacious reading rooms and new digital resources make studying more convenient and productive.

posts.author: Riika Seeba
posts.content: Tallinn Old Town - A UNESCO World Heritage Site
